sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>BioTech's expertise with replacing natural limbs into superior cybernetics also extends to legs. For those with the credits, the loss of such limbs does not have to mean any loss of ability and can even lead to greater mobility than before. Advanced models such as the Mod II can offer greater power, while the Mod III uses computerguided gyroscopic implants for superior quickness. Note that cyberlegs must be purchased as a pair.   Mod II Cyberlegs provide + 1 Brawn, while the Mod III provides + 1 Agility. The wearer must have both legs replaced to receive the bonus to his characteristics.   Models Include: BioTech Industries Cyberlegs Mod II and Mod III.</description> <encumbrance>0</encumbrance> <hard_points/> <hp_required/> <name>Cybernetic Leg Mod II and III</name> <number>GEAR0001064</number> <price>10000</price> <range/> <rarity>6</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-02 19:23:06</sys_created_on> <sys_id>bc426f242f14a450e0f497eef699b6de</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-02 19:23:06</sys_updated_on> <type>gear</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Cybernetic Leg Mod II and III
